scripts.install-all: echo Installing dependencies... && npm install --silent && cd backend && npm install --silent && cd ../frontend && npm install --silent
scripts.start: npm run install-all --silent && concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c cyan,#008B8B "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.format: concurrently "npm run format --prefix backend" "npm run format --prefix frontend"
scripts.heroku-build: cd backend && npm install && npm run start
